original_title: Sri Lanka coconut auction prices down 0.7-pct
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s coconut auction prices edged down 0.77 percent from a week ago at an auction on March 02, data showed.
The average price for 1,000 nuts fell to 84,355.08 from 85,014.15 a week earlier at the weekly auction conducted by Sri Lanka’s Coconut Development Authority.
The highest price was 91,600 rupees for 1,000 nuts down from the previous week’s 93,000 rupees, while the lowest was 77,500 up from 73,800 rupees.
The auction offered 711,308 coconuts and 579,801 nuts were sold. (Colombo/Mar 05/2023)
